attributes.action: CHANGE THE LAW so that cremation is the only lawful method of disposal of dead human bodies, no exemptions.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do is in upper case lettering.  You seem, so often, to be unable to identify what it is we want you to do for us.  We hope this is helpful.

There will be massive benefits from no longer poisoning what is a reducing asset, in these islands, the ground we stand on.  Additionally, of course, with fewer dead bodies in the ground able to spin, less people will feel obliged to vote RED or BLUE in future elections.
